last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 7
last_episode_to_air.overview: Alyson assumes she will be made the new CEO, but then learns that others are being considered, on top of receiving some other life-changing news. Jenny expresses her disappointment over Roger’s decision to resign and where it leaves her. Sally takes a step backward before moving forward with her life.

name: Monday Monday
overview:
Monday Monday is an ITV, UTV comedy drama. It stars Fay Ripley, Jenny Agutter, Neil Stuke, Holly Aird, Morven Christie, Tom Ellis, and Miranda Hart.

It is set in the head office of a supermarket that has fallen on hard times and had to re-locate its staff from London to Leeds. The show was initially announced as part of ITV's Winter 2007 press pack, but was "iced" until 2009 due to falling advertising in the wake of the economic downturn.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Upon relocating to Leeds, Sally discovers the guy she met at a bar the night before is actually one of her new co-workers. Meanwhile, Christine is feeling threatened by the new Chief Operating Officer - Alyson Cartmell - as she doesn’t seem inclined to let drinking and incompetence slide.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Steven faces sexual harassment charges and Max sets out to impress Alyson after he concludes that she, not Roger, holds the real power.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Max is finally made acting head of Marketing and reminds Natasha and Vince that only one of them can be promoted to his assistant. Office rumors are being spread via a blog, but the real identity of the perpetrator is a mystery.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Alyson calls in outside help to deal with Roger’s recent PR gaffs because she is distracted by serious family issues. As Steven and Sally move closer, things get complicated.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Christine volunteers Sally for a temporary job swap and gets a young guy from the Butterworth’s bakery counter in her place. Staff appraisals are accidentally distributed to everyone and Christine must find a way to repair hurt feelings.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Roger’s long-held secret is finally revealed. And, once again, Christine is derailed in her efforts for a real recovery. Things between Sally and Steven reach a climax.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Alyson assumes she will be made the new CEO, but then learns that others are being considered, on top of receiving some other life-changing news. Jenny expresses her disappointment over Roger’s decision to resign and where it leaves her. Sally takes a step backward before moving forward with her life.
